description: The Snail is a double-minded woman. She desperately tries to keep out of most of the fights of the other desert lords and thus is rarely seen outside her castle. Once set up her defense can withstand even the strongest enemies. Her attacks are... reluctant though.
taunt_1: You wretched midge! I will erase your name from history!
taunt_2: Miserable critter! I will flog you just like I would flog a tyke!
taunt_3: I offer you a way out - leave these lands and I will spare you.
taunt_4: I beg you, come to your senses, befor it is too late! You cannot possibly meet my host's challenges!
anger_1: Go ahead, savour your victory. In the end I will be the victorious one, by some means or other...
plead: This is a fundamental misunderstanding! Never would I deal ill with anybody; please, have mercy!
nervous_1: Bolt the gates, bolster up the ramparts! The only way open to us now is to sit out the tempest...
nervous_2: My schemes have miserably failed... maybe I should look out for a new ally?
victory_1: Pah! Was that all? Disappointing but not surprising.
victory_2: Ha! Everything is going to plan! See: defying me was a mistake.
victory_4: Usurpers aren't what they used to be. Imprudent, all of them.
request: My dear friend, surely your storehouses are well filled - could you possibly help me out with a little something?
thanks: This is just too kind. Thank you so much!
ally_death: Our alliance has not proved strong enough - but I will take vengeance!
congrats: Congratulations on your performance! Our enemies have underrated the strength of our alliance!
boast: An adversary has underestimated my stake in our alliance. I have punished his neglectfulness!
help: The enemy is at the gates of my castle! I cannot withstand any longer! You must come to my defence!
extra: UÃ¤rgh, look at those sweaty gamer hands... time to take a break!
siege: Look, I have found new friends!
no_attack_1: Pardon me, you are too fast. My armed forces are not prepared yet.
no_attack_2: To keep it plain and simple: No.
no_help_1: I wish I could help you. It is just... - that I don't want to.
no_help_2: Indeed you will manage on your own!
no_sent: My funds are always narrow - regrettably I cannot help you.
team_winning: Our alliance is strong! In the end our enemies will get what they deserve!
team_losing: We are being forced back! Do something, prove that you are worth being my ally!
help_sent: My forces are on the way! I sincerely hope they will be in time!
will_attack: Why not? I was bored anyway...
